verses.english: A reading from the Acts of our fathers the apostles, who were invested with the grace of the Holy Spirit. May their blessings be with us. Amen.
verses.arabic: فصل من اعمال آبائنا الرسل الأطهار، بركتهم تكون معنا

verses.english: The word of the Lord shall grow, multiply, be mighty, and be confirmed in the holy Church of God. Amen
verses.arabic: لم تزل كلمة الرب تنو وتعتز وتثبت في كنيسة الله المقدسة. آمين
